title: Titan of terror: The dark imagination of H.P. Lovecraft - Silvia Moreno-Garc√≠a

multiple-choice.question: What type of horror stories did Howard Phillips Lovecraft popularize?

options.label: A
options.text: Supernatural horror stories

options.label: B
options.text: Gothic horror stories

options.label: C
options.text: Cosmic horror stories with scientific elements

options.label: D
options.text: Slasher horror stories

multiple-choice.question: What is the name of the shared universe created by Lovecraft and his contemporaries?

options.label: A
options.text: The Lovecraftian Universe

options.label: B
options.text: The Cthulhu Mythos

options.label: C
options.text: The HorrorVerse

options.label: D
options.text: The Dark Realm

multiple-choice.question: What is the source of terror in Lovecraftian horror stories?

options.label: A
options.text: Graphic violence and gore

options.label: B
options.text: Recognizable monsters and creatures

options.label: C
options.text: What's not directly portrayed, but left to the imagination

options.label: D
options.text: Startling shocks and jump scares

multiple-choice.question: What was Lovecraft's occupation, and how did he incorporate it into his stories?

options.label: A
options.text: He was a scientist, and he incorporated scientific methodology into his stories

options.label: B
options.text: He was a historian, and he incorporated historical events into his stories

options.label: C
options.text: He was a researcher, and he incorporated research and investigation into his stories

options.label: D
options.text: He was a mathematician, and he incorporated mathematical concepts into his stories

multiple-choice.question: What was Lovecraft's personal life like, and how did it contrast with his literary legacy?

options.label: A
options.text: He was wealthy and famous during his lifetime, but his work was forgotten after his death

options.label: B
options.text: He was unknown and penniless during his lifetime, but his work became famous after his death

options.label: C
options.text: He was a successful author during his lifetime, and his work continued to be popular after his death

options.label: D
options.text: He was a recluse during his lifetime, and his work was only discovered after his death

title: The hidden network that makes the internet possible - Sajan Saini

multiple-choice.question: What is the main advantage of fiber optic signals over electrical signals in terms of data transmission?

options.label: A
options.text: Fiber optic signals are more prone to degradation over long distances.

options.label: B
options.text: Fiber optic signals are more expensive to implement.

options.label: C
options.text: Fiber optic signals barely degrade over great distances.

options.label: D
options.text: Fiber optic signals are more susceptible to interference.

multiple-choice.question: What is the phenomenon that allows light to travel within glass fibers instead of passing through them?

options.label: A
options.text: Total internal reflection

options.label: B
options.text: Refraction

options.label: C
options.text: Diffraction

options.label: D
options.text: Interference

multiple-choice.question: What is the main problem with traditional electrical cables used in data centers?

options.label: A
options.text: They are too expensive to implement.

options.label: B
options.text: They are prone to interference.

options.label: C
options.text: Half of their running power is wasted as heat.

options.label: D
options.text: They are too slow for data transmission.

multiple-choice.question: What is the purpose of integrated photonics in relation to fiber optics?

options.label: A
options.text: To replace fiber optics with a new technology.

options.label: B
options.text: To enable engineers to shrink fiber optic devices down to tiny photonic chips.

options.label: C
options.text: To increase the bandwidth demand of wireless signals.

options.label: D
options.text: To reduce the heat waste of traditional electrical cables.

multiple-choice.question: What is the potential benefit of using terahertz frequencies in wireless communication?

options.label: A
options.text: They can carry data thousands of times slower than gigahertz signals.

options.label: B
options.text: They can carry data thousands of times faster than gigahertz signals.

options.label: C
options.text: They are more prone to interference than gigahertz signals.

options.label: D
options.text: They are more expensive to implement than gigahertz signals.
